content: meet the farrow sweater this drop-shoulder design is knit seamlessly from the top down making for a smooth finish it showcases elegant farrow stitches on the back complemented by intricate farrow cables on the front and sleeves construction begins flat with the back neckline incorporating increases for shaping then the front is picked up along the shoulders where farrow cables are worked to shape both the neckline and armholes once the front and back pieces are complete they re joined at the underarms and knit in the round to your preferred length for a unique touch the lower body splits to create separate front and back hems with a stylish overlap at the sides sleeves are created by picking up stitches using short row to shape the sleeve cap for a comfortable fit the rest of the sleeve is then joined and knit in the round concluding with long ribbed cuffs finally a cosy double-folded collar adds the perfect finishing touch **size** xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl **finished bust size ** 83 5 94 101 5 112 122 5 133 143 5 154 161 5 cm 33 5 37 5 40 5 44 75 49 53 25 57 5 61 5 64 5 model in size m with approx 15cm/6 of positive ease see more finished measurements below **materials** 6 6 6 7 8 8 9 9 9 balls of hobbii soft alpaca 50g/165m 180yds 875 950 950 1075 1175 1225 1325 1425 1475 meters 955 1040 1040 1175 1285 1340 1450 1560 1615 yards 5 5 5 6 6 7 7 8 8 balls of hobbii friends kid silk 25g/200m 218yds 875 950 950 1075 1175 1225 1325 1425 1475 meters 955 1040 1040 1175 1285 1340 1450 1560 1615 yards **needles & notions** 4mm us6 circular needle 40-80cm/16-32 4 5mm us7 circular needle 40-80cm/16-32 stitch markers stitch holders tapestry needle **yarn quality** hobbii soft alpaca 100% alpaca lot 374306 col 02 50g/1 75oz = 165 m / 180 yds hobbii friends kid silk 72% mohair 25% silk 3% wool lot 94475 col 05 25g/0 9oz = 200m / 218 yds **gauge** 23 sts x 28 row = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 x 4 in farrow stitch using 4 5mm knitting needles after wet blocking
